title: Decline Dumbbell Flyes
description: Place a pair of dumbbells on the floor next to a decline bench. Secure yourself in the bench. Pick up dumbbells and hold them above you with a slight bend in the elbow. Keeping the dumbbells in line with your chest, slowly open up your arms to the sides. Stop when your upper arms are parallel with the floor. Squeeze your chest muscles and slowly return to starting position. Repeat.
